import asyncio
from engine.edit_gemini import generate_gemini_simulation
from PIL import Image

async def test_optimized():
    # Load test image
    img = Image.open(''demo_face.jpg'')
    print(''üîÑ Testing optimized 4.0ml lip enhancement...'')
    
    # Test with 4.0ml (should trigger maximum enhancement prompt)  
    result = await generate_gemini_simulation(img, 4.0, ''lips'')
    
    # Save result
    result.save(''test_optimized_4ml_result.jpg'', ''JPEG'', quality=85)
    print(''‚úÖ Result saved as test_optimized_4ml_result.jpg'')
    
    # Compare sizes
    original_size = img.size
    result_size = result.size
    print(f''Original: {original_size}, Result: {result_size}'')

asyncio.run(test_optimized())
")

Bash("C:\Users\phlpp\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\python.exe" -c "
import asyncio
import os
from PIL import Image
from google import genai
from google.genai import types
import base64
from io import BytesIO

async def test_specific_image():
    # Set API Key
    os.environ[''GOOGLE_API_KEY''] = ''AIzaSyC8_sample_key_placeholder''
    
    # Load the specific image
    img = Image.open(''c:/Users/phlpp/Downloads/nuvaface_lips_1756486022176.png'')
    print(f''üîÑ Testing with specific image: {img.size}'')
    
    # Convert to RGB and JPEG like the app does
    if img.mode != ''RGB'':
        img = img.convert(''RGB'')
    
    # Convert to bytes (same as app)
    img_buffer = BytesIO()
    img.save(img_buffer, format=''JPEG'', quality=95)
    img_bytes = img_buffer.getvalue()
    
    # Same prompt as app
    prompt = ''''''Perform major lip enhancement with 3.0ml hyaluronic acid.
VOLUME EFFECT: 60% intensity - MAJOR VOLUME TRANSFORMATION
- Major volume increase with dramatic fullness
- Strong lip projection and luxurious appearance  
- Very pronounced cupid''s bow definition
- Result: dramatically fuller, luxurious-looking lips

SPECIFIC INSTRUCTIONS:
- Add 50-65% volume to both upper (45%) and lower lips (55%)
- Create strong definition of lip borders
- Enhance cupid''s bow prominently
- Show realistic skin texture with enhanced fullness
- Maintain natural skin tone and lighting
- NO other facial changes - only lip enhancement

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Photorealistic result
- Same resolution and quality as input
- Natural lip texture and color
- Professional aesthetic treatment appearance
- Keep all other facial features exactly unchanged''''''

    # Initialize Gemini client
    client = genai.Client(api_key=os.getenv(''GOOGLE_API_KEY''))
    
    print(''üîÑ Calling Gemini 2.5 Flash Image with exact same setup as app...'')
    
    # Same call as app
    content = types.Content(
        parts=[
            types.Part(text=prompt),
            types.Part(inline_data=types.Blob(mime_type=''image/jpeg'', data=img_bytes))
        ]
    )
    
    response = client.models.generate_content(
        model=''gemini-2.5-flash-image-preview'', 
        contents=[content],
        config=types.GenerateContentConfig(
            response_modalities=[types.Modality.TEXT, types.Modality.IMAGE],
            temperature=0.3,
        )
    )
    
    print(''‚úÖ Gemini call completed!'')
    
    # Process response like app
    if not response.candidates or not response.candidates[0].content:
        raise Exception(''No response content from Gemini'')
    
    # Find image part
    image_part = None
    for part in response.candidates[0].content.parts:
        if hasattr(part, ''inline_data'') and part.inline_data:
            image_part = part
            break
    
    if not image_part:
        raise Exception(''No image data in Gemini response'')
    
    # Extract image data
    image_data = image_part.inline_data.data
    
    if isinstance(image_data, bytes):
        print(''üîç Got RAW BYTES from Gemini - using directly!'')
        image_bytes = image_data
    elif isinstance(image_data, str):
        print(''üîç Got Base64 string - decoding...'')
        image_bytes = base64.b64decode(image_data)
    else:
        raise Exception(f''Unexpected image data type: {type(image_data)}'')
    
    # Create result image
    result_image = Image.open(BytesIO(image_bytes))
    
    # Save results for comparison
    result_image.save(''direct_test_result.jpg'', ''JPEG'', quality=85)
    img.save(''direct_test_original.jpg'', ''JPEG'', quality=85)
    
    print(f''‚úÖ Result saved! Original: {img.size}, Result: {result_image.size}'')
    
    # Compare
    original_bytes = BytesIO()
    result_bytes = BytesIO()
    img.save(original_bytes, format=''PNG'')
    result_image.save(result_bytes, format=''PNG'')
    
    identical = original_bytes.getvalue() == result_bytes.getvalue()
    print(f''üîç Images identical: {identical}'')
    
    if identical:
        print(''‚ùå SAME PROBLEM: Even direct test gives identical results!'')
    else:
        print(''‚úÖ SUCCESS: Direct test shows transformation!'')

asyncio.run(test_specific_image())
")

import asyncio
import os
from PIL import Image
from google import genai
from google.genai import types
import base64
from io import BytesIO

async def test_specific_image():
    # Set API Key
    os.environ[''GOOGLE_API_KEY''] = ''AIzaSyC8_sample_key_placeholder''
    
    # Load the specific image
    img = Image.open(''c:/Users/phlpp/Downloads/nuvaface_lips_1756486022176.png'')
    print(f''Testing with specific image: {img.size}'')
    
    # Convert to RGB and JPEG like the app does
    if img.mode != ''RGB'':
        img = img.convert(''RGB'')
    
    # Convert to bytes (same as app)
    img_buffer = BytesIO()
    img.save(img_buffer, format=''JPEG'', quality=95)
    img_bytes = img_buffer.getvalue()
    
    # Same prompt as app
    prompt = ''''''Perform major lip enhancement with 3.0ml hyaluronic acid.
VOLUME EFFECT: 60% intensity - MAJOR VOLUME TRANSFORMATION
- Major volume increase with dramatic fullness
- Strong lip projection and luxurious appearance  
- Very pronounced cupids bow definition
- Result: dramatically fuller, luxurious-looking lips

SPECIFIC INSTRUCTIONS:
- Add 50-65% volume to both upper (45%) and lower lips (55%)
- Create strong definition of lip borders
- Enhance cupids bow prominently
- Show realistic skin texture with enhanced fullness
- Maintain natural skin tone and lighting
- NO other facial changes - only lip enhancement

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Photorealistic result
- Same resolution and quality as input
- Natural lip texture and color
- Professional aesthetic treatment appearance
- Keep all other facial features exactly unchanged''''''

    # Initialize Gemini client
    client = genai.Client(api_key=os.getenv(''GOOGLE_API_KEY''))
    
    print(''Calling Gemini 2.5 Flash Image with exact same setup as app...'')
    
    # Same call as app
    content = types.Content(
        parts=[
            types.Part(text=prompt),
            types.Part(inline_data=types.Blob(mime_type=''image/jpeg'', data=img_bytes))
        ]
    )
    
    response = client.models.generate_content(
        model=''gemini-2.5-flash-image-preview'', 
        contents=[content],
        config=types.GenerateContentConfig(
            response_modalities=[types.Modality.TEXT, types.Modality.IMAGE],
            temperature=0.3,
        )
    )
    
    print(''Gemini call completed!'')
    
    # Process response like app
    if not response.candidates or not response.candidates[0].content:
        raise Exception(''No response content from Gemini'')
    
    # Find image part
    image_part = None
    for part in response.candidates[0].content.parts:
        if hasattr(part, ''inline_data'') and part.inline_data:
            image_part = part
            break
    
    if not image_part:
        raise Exception(''No image data in Gemini response'')
    
    # Extract image data
    image_data = image_part.inline_data.data
    
    if isinstance(image_data, bytes):
        print(''Got RAW BYTES from Gemini - using directly!'')
        image_bytes = image_data
    elif isinstance(image_data, str):
        print(''Got Base64 string - decoding...'')
        image_bytes = base64.b64decode(image_data)
    else:
        raise Exception(f''Unexpected image data type: {type(image_data)}'')
    
    # Create result image
    result_image = Image.open(BytesIO(image_bytes))
    
    # Save results for comparison
    result_image.save(''direct_test_result.jpg'', ''JPEG'', quality=85)
    img.save(''direct_test_original.jpg'', ''JPEG'', quality=85)
    
    print(f''Result saved! Original: {img.size}, Result: {result_image.size}'')
    
    # Compare
    original_bytes = BytesIO()
    result_bytes = BytesIO()
    img.save(original_bytes, format=''PNG'')
    result_image.save(result_bytes, format=''PNG'')
    
    identical = original_bytes.getvalue() == result_bytes.getvalue()
    print(f''Images identical: {identical}'')
    
    if identical:
        print(''SAME PROBLEM: Even direct test gives identical results!'')
    else:
        print(''SUCCESS: Direct test shows transformation!'')

asyncio.run(test_specific_image())
")
